text: :For the Ford Fusion sold in Europe, see Ford Fusion (Europe). The American Ford Fusion is a car produced by Ford Motor Company from 2005 to 2020 starting with the 2006 model year. It is sold in the Americas. The first generation model was produced from the 2006 to 2012 model years with a facelift in early 2009 as a 2010 model. The second generation model launched in late 2012 as a 2013 model and was facelifted in Spring 2016 as a 2017 model. Ford discontinued the Fusion in 2020 without a replacement due to more people buying crossovers and SUVs. Fusion (Americas) category:2000s automobiles
title: Ford Fusion (Americas)
